summary:
I'm witch, but I don't have Magicka. You can equip with this book, to attack the enemy then. This book is weapon.
This mod adds new weapon of heavy spellbook can be crafted.
descriptionHtml:
Description
I'm witch, but I don't have Magicka. You can equip with this book, to attack the enemy then. This book is weapon.
This mod adds new weapon of heavy spellbook can be crafted.

Details
You will be able to equip with heavy spellbook (Alteration,Conjuration,Destruction,Illusion,Restoration).
You will be able to craft this.
You can buy these books from exclusive NPC in the library of Winterhold college.
These books treated as one hand mace.
This mod isn't a replacement for default weapon. This is added.
These textures of these books refer to the textures of the normal spellbooks.
When you install MOD that replace these textures, these textures of these books are also replaces.

Requirements
The following or their later versions are required to run this mod:
Skyrim 1.9.32+

Installation
HeavySpellbook.esm put on Date folder.
1stpersonbook(Conjuration).nif and HeavySpellbook(Conjuration).nif put on Data/meshes/weapons/book

Uninstallation
Delete the file of installation.

How to use
Please equip as weapon.

Known Bugs
Thumb dent into this book when equipped and ready.
Arm dent into this book when equipped with the left hand.
(I can't edit animation. Looking for a someone to edit.)

Credit
Guard Number 1 :Whiterun guard twitter:white0guard0 This MOD

Aron ApachiiSkyHair natural Retexture http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35092
Apachii ApachiiSkyHair http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168

Permission
You must get permission from me before you are allowed to modify my files to improve it.

Change log
January 11, 2014 Release 1.0
January 13, 2014 Release 1.5 Fixed the mistake of the name spelling, Added the ReadMe of Japanese. Added the textures(Alteration,Destruction,Illusion,Restoration).
April 24, 2014 Release 2.0 Changed to look the cover.
May 29, 2014 Release 3.0 Changed to look the cover if NPC is equipped. Added NPC for shop.
author: Guard Number 1
